title: Tell me about your typical workday. What do you do from morning to evening?

korean: 이메일 확인하면서 오늘 할 일 정리하는 게 루틴이야.
10시쯤 팀 미팅 있으면 참석하고, 프로젝트 진행 상황 공유해.
점심 전까지는 주로 집중해서 업무 처리하는 시간이야.
12시 반쯤 동료들이랑 회사 근처 식당 가서 밥 먹어.
점심 먹고 돌아오면 좀 졸려서 커피 한 잔 더 마셔.
오후엔 회의나 협업 업무가 많은 편이야.
3시쯤 되면 간식 먹으면서 잠깐 쉬기도 해.
5시 넘어가면 슬슬 마무리하면서 내일 할 일 정리해.
급한 일 없으면 6시쯤 퇴근하는데, 요즘은 좀 늦게 퇴근하는 날이 많아.
집 도착하면 씻고 쉬면서 하루를 마무리해.
english: I go to work around 9, and, well, I start by having coffee first.
While checking emails, I organize what to do today, you know, it's my routine.
Around 10, if there's a team meeting, I attend and share project progress.
Before lunch, it's mainly time to focus on, like, work tasks.
Around 12:30, I go to a restaurant near the office with colleagues to eat.
When I come back from lunch, I'm a bit sleepy, so I drink another cup of coffee.
In the afternoon, I mean, there are a lot of meetings and collaborative work.
Around 3, I sometimes take a short break while eating snacks.
After 5, I gradually wrap up and, well, organize tomorrow's tasks.
If there's nothing urgent, I leave around 6, but, like, these days I often leave late.
On my way home, I listen to podcasts while going home.
When I get home, I wash up and rest, you know, finishing the day.
